lead_paragraph: Hillary Clinton did call the Trans-Pacific Partnership a “gold standard,” though it wasn’t Donald Trump who changed her mind.

headline.print_headline: Trump Scores Points  on Trade in Debate, but Misses on Accuracy
headline.main: Trump Scores Points on Trade in Debate, but Not So Much on Accuracy

snippet: Hillary Clinton did call the Trans-Pacific Partnership a “gold standard,” though it wasn’t Donald Trump who changed her mind....
abstract: Donald J Trump scores points against rival Hillary Clinton in first presidential debate on trade, attacking both North American Free Trade Agreement and Trans-Pacific Partnership; Clinton appears on defensive, struggling to counter aggressive attacks on her, particularly on her past support for Trans-Pacific Partnership.
